body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       While no dining facilities are available on the grounds of Fort Scott NHS,. picnicing is allowed on the site and a designated picnic area is located near the RV and Bus Parking area. Picnic tables are also located on Skubitz Plaza adjacent to the site.. There are several restauraunts within walking distance of the site. Overnight camping is prohibited on the grounds of Fort Scott NHS, but there are campgrounds and lodging facilities nearby.
title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Eating & Sleeping
